sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import request from '../../utils/request'; import Moment from 'moment' function News({setNewsData, newsData}) { return(<>

TOP NEWS STORIES

{ newsData.map((news,index) =>{ return(
{window.open('/countReport', "_blank")}}>

{news.news_title}

{Moment(news.news_publish_date_time).format('MMMM Do YYYY, h:mm:ss a')}

{news.news_description && news.news_description.slice(0, 100)+'.........'}
) }) }
) } export default News
